longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of Monaco must be valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of Monaco.
  

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- Alien minors up to/including 17 years of age can be included
  in parent's passport, provided travelling with their
  parents.
  
Additional Information:
- Valid visas in full, invalidated travel documents are
  accepted provided accompanied by a new travel document
